price: Molite se ponizno i u sebi Gospodaru svome, On, doista, ne voli one koji granicu prelaze.
arabic: ٱدۡعُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ تَضَرُّعٗا وَخُفۡيَةًۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُعۡتَدِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: id'ʿū rabbakum taḍarruʿan wakhuf'yatan innahu lā yuḥibbu al-muʿ'tadīna
